title: Progress Updates
text:
What to do?
Create an instrument that can detect risks of getting positional obstructive sleep apneas (POSA) using two factors:

Snoring sound
Supine (lies flat) position of the sleeper

If the instrument detects both factors, it will vibrate to encourage position changing of the sleeper.

Programmable using Arduino or MicroPython languages through USB-C interface
